member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.Extensions
member.summary: Provides methods for converting between common language runtime types and JSON types.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Extensions.Json``1(``0)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to a JSON string.
member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Extensions.LoadAnonymousObject``1(System.String,``0@)
member.summary: 加载匿名类型的数据，由于匿名类型找不到定义，所以需要使用参数来对泛型产生类型约束
member.typeparam: 匿名对象的类型定义，但是这个是没有太多用途的，只是为了产生泛型约束
member.param: 真正的匿名类型的信息是来自于函数的这个参数的

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Extensions.Json(System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to a JSON string.
member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.Extensions.CreateObject(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Create a class object from the input json data. Deserializes the JSON to the specified .NET type.
member.returns: The deserialized object from the JSON string.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
